Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance and quality. We believe its value exceeds expectations, making it an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be securing not only an extraordinary product but also a rare opportunity to own something truly special. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
